title: Soap Opera Over: Tom Pidcock Seems to be Staying with Ineos Grenadiers After All
content:
Pidcock appears at Ineos Grenadiers' end-of-year camp to draw a close to long-running speculation he would split from the struggling 'super team.'

Read the full article at Soap Opera Over: Tom Pidcock Seems to be Staying with Ineos Grenadiers After All on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
